MAN.TITLE: unfold_phase
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: unfolds the phase of a field (or difractive wavefront)

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: :input phase matrix of the field. it must be num*num matrix.
: the coefficient to multiply the phase, it may be necessary to translate the phase into dimensional units
: the radius of blackening aperture. relative to grid size
: a identifier to demonstrate the base function (unf3 or unf4) to use.if default then unf3 used.

DESCRIPTION.P: unfolds the phase by the function unf3 of LightPipes.
